sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SIBENICO, or Sebenico, the name of a city and province of Dalmatia. The province of Sibenico runs along the ſea for more than 30 miles ; reaches in ſome places above 20 miles within land, and comprehends above 70 iſlands. The city of Sibenico is situated near the mouth of the river Cherca, in the Gulf of Venice,

35 miles north of Spalatto, and 25 ſouth-eaſt of Zara. E. Long, 16⁰ 46', N. Lat. 440 17'. It belongs to the Venetians. It is defended on one side by a caſtle, which held out againſt repeated attacks of the Turks, and towards the ſea by a fort.
